gen:link.msg:message: לא תקין. אם ATM צמוד לסניף אין למלא סעיפים 9-14. {{if([888-3:C3] ({$a}) = true(), and(not(anyPresent([888-3:C9] ({$v_1}))), not(anyPresent([888-3:C10] ({$v_2}))), not(anyPresent([888-3:C11] ({$v_3}))), not(anyPresent([888-3:C12] ({$v_4}))), not(anyPresent([888-3:C13] ({$v_5}))), not(anyPresent([888-3:C14] ({$v_6})))), and(not(not(anyPresent([888-3:C9] ({$v_7})))), not(not(anyPresent([888-3:C10] ({$v_8})))), not(not(anyPresent([888-3:C11] ({$v_9})))), not(not(anyPresent([888-3:C12] ({$v_10})))), not(not(anyPresent([888-3:C13] ({$v_11})))), not(not(anyPresent([888-3:C14] ({$v_12}))))))}}
